gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 107, Nets 77
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings defeated the Nets, 107-77. DeAaron Fox led the Kings with 20 points, five rebounds, and three assists as Domantas Sabonis (18 points, 20 rebounds, nine assists) and Keegan Murray (19 points, six rebounds, four assists) added 39 points. Cam Thomas led the Nets with 21 points and four rebounds. The Kings snap a two-game skid as they move to 45-33 while Brooklyn falls to 31-48.
